TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Fornece dados para um evento com foco alterado.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

param.name: idObject
param.span: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] do objeto que recebeu o foco.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

param.name: idChild
param.span: A ID filha do objeto que recebeu o foco.

span.span: The child ID of the object that received focus.

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] objeto identificadores que clientes de automação de interface do usuário podem usar para vincular um para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o identificador [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] filho do objeto recebendo o foco.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] são valores de 32 bits que identificam as categorias de objetos acessíveis dentro de um aplicativo.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que os clientes podem usar para vincular um para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] do objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] que gerou o evento.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: A ID do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elemento que está recebendo o foco.

span.span: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: Para obter os valores possíveis, consulte [identificadores de objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) na documentação do Microsoft Active Accessibility.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] são valores de 32 bits que identificam as categorias de objetos acessíveis dentro de um aplicativo.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que os clientes podem usar para vincular um para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
